summary:
SSAO / DOF
All Effects you want to have in your Game with an amazingly small Fps Drop!
My Goal was to have an ENB I would like to play with, Not an ENB with Amazing Graphics but shitty Fps! ENBSeries v0.109 BETA was used to reach this Goal.
descriptionHtml:
Uses the newest  ENBSeries  v0.112 KAGE!
This version is similar to 0.103, but with new shadow effect, bugfix for parallax, optimization. Performance in this version optimized for ATI 
PICTURE:
[img]http://www.freeimagehosting.net/newuploads/e2l5d.jpg[/img]



Are you tired of shitty ENBs that don\'t work well on your PC? 
This ENB has a very good Framerate. It comes in threee versions:

Strong DOF_____SLOWEST----\\    
-----------------------------------------\\                                         
Natural DOF____MIDDLE----------|--  All versions come with Fast SSAO
 ----------------------------------------/                                        
NO DOF________FASTEST------/     

VIDEO:
 [url=http://youtu.be/r8ORA4ZT6rs] XTRA-AWESOME ENB Nice Performance [Full-HD] | 1.0 (YouTube) [/url]
 [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mw1kGX_ZuvE] Is this really Skyrim...? [HD+] ENB | AWESOME![/url]
RECOMMENDED-MODS

-NO PERFORMANCE LOSS-
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13049] IMAGINATOR - Visual Control Device for Skyrim by MyGoodEye and Gopher [/url]
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13531]ULTRA REALISTIC WORLD LIGHTING for Skryim BETA by Marco [/url]

-SLIGHT PERFORMANCE LOSS (WHEN YOU USE TO MUCH OF THEM)-
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=607] Skyrim HD - 2K Textures by NebuLa [/url]
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8262] More Dynamic Shadows and Striping Fixed by PuuLoo[/url]
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3812 ] TreesHD_Skyrim_Variation by namotep[/url]
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2674]Improved NPC Clothing - High Res by BaronDavid[/url]
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=836]Realistic Smoke and Embers by isoku[/url]
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8655]Static Mesh Improvement Mod - SMIM by Brumbek[/url]
 [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12798]Crimson Tide - Blood by Magus[/url]

INSTALLATION:
*First you have to download this enb Files:
Boris Vorontsov don\'t wants his Core Files to be postetd on the Nexus. 
So go to his Site and download the Files!

 [url=http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0112.htm] ENBSeries v0.112 KAGE [/url]

You can check you\'re graphics card by typing \"DXDIAG\" into the Search Bar in Windows!

Drag and drop them into your Skyrim Folder

*Then Drag and Drop the Content from the Downloads
Strong / Natural / No DOF into your Folder

Say yes to overwrite!

FAQ:
Q: The nights are too dark what should I do?
A: No problem download the vanilla Nights Fiel in the Download Section and darg and drop it into your Skyrim Folder

Q: My Game isn\'t looking like yours!
A: I recommend using it with
ULTRA REALISTIC﻿ WORLD LIGHTING for Skryim (No Performance Loss!)
and
IMAGINATOR - Visual Control Device for Skyrim (No Performance Loss!)
The mod only gives you the opportunities, the mods above are you\'re tools.
Adjust the Brightness and the Colors! 

CREDITS:
*RaysBays for the Core Files
*Bethesda for this great Game!
*And Boris Vorontsov and his Team for the Enb mods!
author: XtraAwesomeXtraHD
